q: the Indy Star: U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. But it contains few surprises and, after so many years of divisive debate, is unlikely to change many minds, writes Howard Kurtz .`` What is known is that he has in these 50 chapters marshaled his best defense; only history's final verdict remains unknown.''
